description:
Salad turns downtime into downloads. Run Salad whenever you're away from the keys to score games, gift cards, subscriptions, DLC, and more at the Salad Storefront.


Update to version 1.9.8:
- Addresses an intermittent issue where node diagnostic workloads were able to run.
- Fixes an issue where container workloads could suddenly stop.
Windows 10 and 11: Salad-1.9.8.exe
SHA-256: 338FC4BA19E871BC937B48FB2D6AD6A5AC47C4ED333F13BF97DB97BB8E183637
SHA-1: 656A6781AF9843E217D8379F4D0A6082BFD70CE3
Errors? Warnings? Concerns? Questions? We understand. Read our blog post on anti-virus and cryptocurrency miners and check out our anti-virus configuration guides.
